scenario.name: External Registrar
scenario.send: SIP/2.0 200 OK [last_Via:] [last_From:] [last_To:];tag=[pid]SIPpTag01[call_number] [last_Call-ID:] [last_CSeq:] Route: <sip:P3.EXAMPLEHOME.COM;lr>,<sip:P1.EXAMPLEVISITED.COM;lr> Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
